page.title: 02Outdoor centre at Achnamara
page.content: THE LARGE HOUSE IN ACHNAMARA A RESIDENTIAL SCHOOL FROM 1956_1977,THIS YEAR IS BEING CHANGED TO AN OUTDOOR CENTRE LIKELY OPENING IN SEPTEMBER. IT WILL BE USED FOR MAINLY 16_17 YEAR OLDS IN YOUTH TRAINING SCHEME FOR WORK EXPERIENCE ORGANISED BY MANPOWER SERVICES FOR PUPILS WHO DO NOT GO TO FURTHER EDUCATION OR A JOB.THEY WILL COME FROM GLASGOW AND OTHER PARTS OF STRATHCLYDE. THEIR ACTIVITIES WILL INCLUDE CANOEING,ROCK CLIMBING,HILL WALKING,SAILING,INITIATIVE COURSES (ASSAULT COURSES)ETC. THERE IS A PRINCIPAL,HIS DEPUTY AND THREE OTHERS ON THE STAFF,OFFICE,HOUSE AND KITCHEN STAFF.THE CENTRE IS PRESENTLY BEING PAINTED BY GROUPS OF UP TO 8 GLASWEGIANS ORGANISED BY COMMUNITY INDUSTRY RUN BY THE ASSOCIATION OF YOUTH CLUBS.
